content:
After listening to you mention Serenity in the episode with Juan Vuletich on Cuis, I heard you mention not really knowing that much. One of the things I don't think you're aware of is that there's actually a programming language as part of the Serenity project as well, with the goal being to eventually replace C++ as the main language of implementation for the OS. I think a conversation between you and him would be really interesting.

Also, just wanted to add I've really been enjoying the podcast. You always seem to find great guests and interesting topics.

I actually assumed that Andreas had already been a guest on Software Unscripted, so I was surprised when I found out he hadn't :sweat_smile: I think I was thinking of an episode of the CoRecursive podcast.

I completely agree, SerenityOS/Ladybird are fascinating projects and Andreas is an excellent speaker :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
I had the same thought. Sometimes it's hard to keep track of who has been on where :)
does anyone know Andreas? Could you make an introduction?
I'm a member of the Serenity discord server, but I've only been lurking there.
